__TOC__

Each symptom area should be added to its own sub-page.  Each symptom page should include a level-2 header (== xxx ==) and one or two paragraphs of explanitory text aimed at confirming that this problem is the users problem, normally you will link to a more detailed guide linked from the <nowiki>[[Kernel-Debugging]]</nowiki> page.  Please try and group related symptoms by prefix so that the pages are ordered together.
